changelog: The phone interface has been completely redesigned to deliver a more modern and consistent look.
More than 20 apps now feature smooth animations, making navigation and interaction more engaging.
15 apps have been visually refreshed with updated layouts, providing a cleaner and more user-friendly experience.
The Notes app now supports pinning notes, allowing you to keep important information easily accessible at all times.
1.7.1 brings bugfixes to Taxi / Billing App, also offers a new Glass design for Lockscreen / ControlCenter and Homescreen
